audit_history.note: Added a wordlist-folder import feature to populate the SQLite rainbow table for unsalted weak-password hash matching.

description: Dumptruck must support importing all `.txt` files in a specified folder as a rainbow table seed source. The folder path is provided via CLI option or configuration. Each file is UTF-8 and contains one value per line. For each value, Dumptruck precomputes common unsalted password hash types (at minimum: MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256) and persists those indicators in SQLite so weak-password detection can match hashed credentials without storing raw values long-term.
name: Import rainbow table wordlists from a folder
